title: SOLD two sharp 1888 Parisian Bob Caruthers, N28 & “Scrapps”
author: YazFenway08

posts.post_title: SOLD two sharp 1888 Parisian Bob Caruthers, N28 & “Scrapps”
posts.post_content:
(1) gorgeous 1888 Allen & Ginter N28 SGC 5.5

nicely centers with great color. 

$825/obo.    recent psa 6 sold at $1080, recent SGC 4 at $600. thinking a 5.5 should situate roughly at the midpoint. 



(2) equally gorgeous raw 1888 HD Smith/“Scrapps” 

I really think this is the nicest Caruthers from this set I have ever seen.  color is beautiful and i don’t see any major surface issues. back is very  clean for the issue with just the one main residue spot 

$775/obo

for the Caruthers fan, both for $1425

payment net paypal. prices include shipping
